## Summary

Initially designed as an experimental tool, the spruce budworm ATM has been operationalized as a near real-time forecasting and backcasting tool.

```{mermaid}
flowchart TD
 A["SBW-ATM (USFS)"]
 B["BioSIM SBW-ATM (CFS)"]
 C["SBW-pyATM (UW)"]
 
 A --> B
 A --> C
```
